titles.title: Luna and Hidalgo Counties Wilderness Study Area Release Act of 2015

To release wilderness study areas administered by the Bureau of Land Management in Luna and Hidalgo Counties, New Mexico that are not suitable for wilderness designation from continued management as de facto wilderness areas.
Luna and Hidalgo Counties Wilderness Study Area Release Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Luna and Hidalgo Counties Wilderness Study Area Release Act of 2015
Releases specified wilderness study areas in the Luna and Hidalgo Counties in New Mexico from further study for designation as wilderness.
